annotations.description: Template for building a full demo application (frontend + api + bucket) using sxapi in an openshift PaaS

message: Your demo stack started to build in your project. You can use openshift console to observe deployment.

annotations.description: Couchbase base image relying on CentOS 7 and based on startx/sv-couchbase docker image
NodeJS base image relying on ${BASE_IMAGE_TAG} and based on startx/nodejs docker image
Couchbase bucket for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS API frontend for the SXAPI Demo
NodeJS Web frontend for the SXAPI Demo

parameters.name: SOURCE_BRANCH
parameters.description: Name of the branch to use for building this application (dev, master, test, prod)

parameters.name: BASE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: Base image flavour to use for buidling this application (latest, fc27, fc28, centos6, centos7)

parameters.name: DEMO_API
parameters.description: Domain name of the API endpoint to use in this frontend (api-xxxxx.apps.startx.fr were xxxxx is your project namespace)

parameters.name: WEBHOOK_TOKEN
parameters.description: Secret token to use in github, gitlab or other to hook build action when code change

parameters.name: COUCHBASE_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Database password of the application user

parameters.name: COUCHBASE_BUCKET
parameters.description: name of the default bucket to create
